name: antd-intellisense
displayName: IntelliSense for antd design of react
description: IntelliSense for antd design of react

html-css-class-completion.includeGlobPat.description: A glob pattern that defines files and folders to search for. The glob pattern will be matched against the paths of resulting matches relative to their workspace.

html-css-class-completion.excludeGlobPat.description: A glob pattern that defines files and folders to exclude. The glob pattern will be matched against the file paths of resulting matches relative to their workspace.

html-css-class-completion.enableEmmetSup.description: Enables completion when you're writing Emmet abbreviations.
